titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Millard Preston Goodfellow Papers, 1942-1967
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Processed by Grace M. Hawes; machine-readable finding aid created by James Lake

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-02-06T08:37-0800

change.item: 2018 January 24: Added links for materials in the 2010 release of records series that are available on digitalcollections.hoover.org. -Sally DeBauche <date calendar="gregorian" normal="20120731" era="ce">July 31, 2012</date><item>Revised to update encoding and add unitid</item></change><change><date normal="20110902">2 September 2011</date><item>Declassified records subseries added</item></change><change><date normal="201010">October 2010</date><item>Declassified records series added</item></change><change><date calendar="gregorian" normal="20040323" era="ce">March 23, 2004</date><item>PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Millard Preston Goodfellow papers)//EN" "reg_294.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).</item>

did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, printed matter, and photographs, relating to Office of Strategic Services operations in North Africa and the Far East during World War II, and to postwar reconstruction in Korea. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Millard Preston Goodfellow papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1969.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

arrangement.p: Arranged alphabetically by name of correspondent.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Memoranda, reports, and printed material arranged alphabetically by title or subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Formerly security-classified records of the U.S. government, released in full or in part. Available as PDF files. The PDF files are page images, so full-text search is not possible. Arranged chronologically by date of release by Hoover, thereunder by date of creation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of British Military Attache, China, report on explosives, 1941, and radiogram from Korea, 1946
